member.name: T:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinificationException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when a minification of asset code by JSMin is failed

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message

member.name: M:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinificationException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception
member.param: The error message that explains the reason for the exception
The exception that is the cause of the current exception

The contextual information about the source or destination

member.summary: Gets a estimated length of minififation output

member.summary: Removes a comments and unnecessary whitespace from JavaScript code

member.summary: Removes a comments and unnecessary whitespace from JavaScript code
member.param: String builder to which to send minification output

member.name: M:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinifier.IsAlphanum(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a true if the character is a letter, digit, underscore, dollar sign, or non-ASCII character

member.name: M:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinifier.Get
member.summary: Returns a next character from input stream. Watch out for lookahead. If the character is a control character, translate it to a space or linefeed.

member.name: M:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinifier.Peek
member.summary: Gets a next character without advancing

member.name: M:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinifier.Next
member.summary: Gets a next character, excluding comments. Peek() is used to see if a '/' is followed by a '/' or '*'.

member.name: M:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinifier.Action(System.Int32)
member.summary: Do something! What you do is determined by the argument: 1 - Output A. Copy B to A. Get the next B. 2 - Copy B to A. Get the next B. (Delete A). 3 - Get the next B. (Delete B). Action treats a string as a single character. Action recognizes a regular expression if it is preceded by the likes of ( or , or =.

member.name: M:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinifier.StartMinification
member.summary: Copies a input to the output, deleting the characters which are insignificant to JavaScript. Comments will be removed. Tabs will be replaced with spaces. Carriage returns will be replaced with linefeeds. Most spaces and linefeeds will be removed.

member.name: M:DouglasCrockford.JsMin.JsMinifier.Put(System.Int32)
member.summary: Puts a character to output stream

member.summary: Extensions for StringBuilder

member.summary: Removes the all leading white-space characters from the current instance
member.returns: Instance of without leading white-space characters
